theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.NAME: Millennium Puzzle
theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.FLAVOR: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.
Challenge Mode: #ySummon #b1 [#FF5252]Exploding [#FF5252]Token at the start of combat. #ySummoning is restricted.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token, gain a random amount (0-10) of #yBlock and gain #b1 #yBlur.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yDragon Token, and choose #b
of #b6 additional effects.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 Nature Token, gain #b1 Vine and #b1 Leaf.
#yPoison or #yConstricted to a random enemy. #ySummon #b1 random Nature Token.
At the start of next combat, #ySummon #b1 #ySpellcaster Token, and have a #b
% chance to #yChannel a random Orb.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yToon Token, and gain #yToon #yWorld.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yZombie Token, and #yChannel a #yShadow orb.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yAqua Token, and increase the number of #yOverflows on a random card in your draw pile by #b2.

At the start of combat, sum up the total #yTribute cost of all monsters in your draw pile and increase the damage of a random monster in you draw pile by that much for the rest of combat. #ySummon #b1 #yFiend Token.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yMachine Token, and add a random Token to your hand.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yStance Token, gain #b3 #yVigor and gain #b2 #yBlur.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yInsect Token and add #yBixi to your hand.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPlant Token and apply #b2 #yConstricted to ALL enemies.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token and gain #b2 #yThorns.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yMegatype Token and add a random monster to your hand.
At the start of combat, #yIncrement and #ySummon #b1 for each Act.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b2 #yPuzzle Tokens, and add a random combination of #yRandomized copies of #bJinzo, #bTrap #bHole and #bUltimate #bOffering to your hand.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount of #yBonanza Tokens and gain a random #yBuff.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yExodia Token. NL All cards in your starter deck have #ySoulbound and you cannot obtain any cards. NL At the start of each turn, draw the #yHead #yof #yExodia.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token (GIANT DECK)
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yMegatype Token.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yMegatype Token and have a #b50% chance to #yChannel a #yShadow orb.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yMegatype Token (ASCENSION DECK)
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token. Whenever you #yTribute with matching monster types, draw a card.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token. Whenever you #yTribute with matching monster types, gain #b5 Block.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token. Whenever you #yTribute with matching monster types, deal #b5 damage to a random enemy.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token. Whenever you #yTribute with matching monster types, add a random Token to your hand.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle Token. Whenever you #yTribute with matching monster types, add a #yMonster #yEgg to your hand.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount #b(1-3) of #yPuzzle Tokens.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount #b(1-3) of #yPuzzle Tokens.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount #b(1-3) of #yPuzzle Tokens.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount #b(1-3) of #yPuzzle Tokens.

theDuelist:MillenniumSymbol.NAME: Millennium Symbol
theDuelist:MillenniumSymbol.FLAVOR: This symbol seems to fit right into the Millennium Puzzle...
DESCRIPTIONS: Improve the effects of the #yMillennium #yPuzzle.
Challenge Mode: No longer #ySummon #yExploding Tokens at the start of combat.
Gain #b1 extra #yBlur at the start of combat.
Increase the number of #yMillennium #yPuzzle effects you may choose to #b3.
Gain #b2 extra #yVines and #yLeaves at the start of combat.
Whenever the #yMillennium #yPuzzle channels an orb at the start of an Elite or Boss combat, channel a second copy of the same orb.
Gain #yToon #yKingdom at the start of combat instead of #yToon #yWorld.
Each combat, have a small chance to channel an additional #yShadow orb.
At the start of combat, choose the card that will have it's #yOverflows increased by the puzzle effect.
Whenever you trigger the puzzle effect, a random tribute monster is added to the total #b3 times.
Instead of random Tokens, choose #b1 of #b5 random Tokens to add to your hand at the start of combat.
At the start of each combat, gain a random amount (0-10) of #yBlock.
#yBixi is #yUpgraded.
Apply #b3 extra #yConstricted to ALL enemies at the start of each combat.
Instead of random monsters, choose #b1 of #b3 random monsters to add to your hand at the start of combat.
After you #yIncrement, gain #yTemporary #yHP equal to your max summons.
Whenever you play #yThe #yCreator, you may choose to shuffle half of the generated cards into your discard pile.

theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzleShared.NAME: Millennium Puzzle
theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzleShared.FLAVOR: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.

theDuelist:MillenniumEye.NAME: Millennium Eye
theDuelist:MillenniumEye.FLAVOR: It was created 3,000 years prior with other Millennium Items by Aknadin. After its creation, Aknadin himself put on the Eye, sacrificing his left eye in the process.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #yToon #yWorld.

theDuelist:MillenniumRing.NAME: Millennium Ring
theDuelist:MillenniumRing.FLAVOR: 3,000 years before present day events, the Millennium Ring and the other Millennium Items were forged in Kul Elna by sacrificing 99 souls of the Kul Elna villagers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yIncrement #b3.

theDuelist:MillenniumKey.NAME: Millennium Key
theDuelist:MillenniumKey.FLAVOR: After it was made, the Millennium Key was given to Solomon Muto's Egyptian incarnate, Shimon, but later it was passed on to Shada.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Your max #ySummons cannot be higher than #b5.

theDuelist:DuelistSnakeEye.NAME: Egyptian Snake Eye
theDuelist:DuelistSnakeEye.FLAVOR: An eye of a desert snecko. Much more dried out than you imagined.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b3 additional cards. Start each combat with #b3 #yMegaConfused.

theDuelist:ElectricKey.NAME: Electric Key
theDuelist:ElectricKey.FLAVOR: A dangerous looking key. You sure I should be carrying this around?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. At the start of each combat, lose #b1 #yElectricity.

theDuelist:ElectricBurst.NAME: Electric Burst
theDuelist:ElectricBurst.FLAVOR: Looks like a big ball of lightning.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b3 #yElectricity. At the end of your first three turns, lose #b1 #yElectricity.

theDuelist:MillenniumRod.NAME: Millennium Rod
theDuelist:MillenniumRod.FLAVOR: Priest Seto had originally owned the Millennium Rod. Along with the other Items, it was used to resurrect Zorc Necrophades.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add a #yRandomized #ySpell to your hand.

theDuelist:MillenniumScale.NAME: Millennium Scale
theDuelist:MillenniumScale.FLAVOR: Also known as the Scales of Truth, The Scale was originally owned by Karim.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yTribute with matching monster types, NL gain #b3 #yTemporary #yHP.

theDuelist:MillenniumNecklace.NAME: Millennium Necklace
theDuelist:MillenniumNecklace.FLAVOR: The Millennium Necklace was originally owned by an unnamed high priestess under Aknamkanon, later by Isis under Atem, in Ancient Egypt.
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive an extra potion reward after every combat.

theDuelist:MillenniumToken.NAME: Millennium Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose #b1 of #b20 Duelist cards to add to your deck. Your #yTokens always cost 0.

theDuelist:MillenniumCard.NAME: Millennium Membership Card
theDuelist:MillenniumCard.FLAVOR: Bonus membership offer for my most powerful Pharoah!
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrade a random #yTribute monster in your deck whenever you enter a shop.

theDuelist:MillenniumHammer.NAME: Millennium Hammer
theDuelist:MillenniumHammer.FLAVOR: A hammer which once belonged to Aknamkanon himself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Consume #b1 #yCharge and #yUpgrade a random card in your deck each time you Smith. Starts with #b3 charges. Each time you pickup a #yMillennium #yItem, gain #b2 charges.

theDuelist:MillenniumStone.NAME: Millennium Stone
theDuelist:MillenniumStone.FLAVOR: A curious stone with seemingly limitless power!
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, #yUpgrade as many cards as you want. Lose #b3 #yMax #yHP for each #yUpgrade.

theDuelist:MillenniumCoin.NAME: Millennium Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b100 #yGold for each other #yMillennium #yItem you have.

theDuelist:StoneExxod.NAME: Stone of Exxod
theDuelist:StoneExxod.FLAVOR: A fragment of the Forbidden One?
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you shuffle your deck, add a random #yExodia card to your hand.

theDuelist:GiftAnubis.NAME: Gift of Anubis
DESCRIPTIONS: NL Summon #b1 and consume #b1 #yCharge. NL Starts with #b1 #yCharge. NL Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b2 #yCharges.

theDuelist:ResummonBranch.NAME: Millennium Branch
theDuelist:ResummonBranch.FLAVOR: The branch of a tree from the Ancient Egyptian era.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, #yResummon a random monster you have played this run for every #b2 cards you #yExhausted on the previous turn.

theDuelist:AeroRelic.NAME: Orb of Slifer
theDuelist:AeroRelic.FLAVOR: A strange orb with mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAir orbs always #yChannel a random orb.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicA.NAME: Reward Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b1 extra card reward and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b0 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b2 #yCharges.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicB.NAME: Reward Token+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b2 extra card rewards and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b1 #yCharge. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b1 #yCharge.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicC.NAME: Reward Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b1 extra card reward and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b5 #yCharges.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicD.NAME: Reward Orb+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, have a #b3% chance to receive #b4 extra card rewards.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicE.NAME: Reward Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, have a #b20% chance to receive #b2 extra card rewards.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicF.NAME: Spelltome
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any Spell to add to your deck.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicG.NAME: Tricktome
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any Trap to add to your deck.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicH.NAME: Battletome
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any Monster to add to your deck.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicI.NAME: Spiretome
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any [#d40e00]Red card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#2a44ec]Blue card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#0c821a]Green card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#5b0bbd]Purple card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#d40e00]Red or [#2a44ec]Blue card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#d40e00]Red or [#0c821a]Green card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#d40e00]Red or [#5b0bbd]Purple card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#2a44ec]Blue or [#0c821a]Green card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#2a44ec]Blue or [#5b0bbd]Purple card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#0c821a]Green or [#5b0bbd]Purple card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any Colorless card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#d40e00]Red or Colorless card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#2a44ec]Blue or Colorless card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#0c821a]Green or Colorless card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#5b0bbd]Purple or Colorless card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#d40e00]Red card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#2a44ec]Blue card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#0c821a]Green card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#5b0bbd]Purple card to add to your deck.
Upon pickup, choose any [#d40e00]Red, [#2a44ec]Blue, [#0c821a]Green, [#5b0bbd]Purple, or Colorless card to add to your deck.

theDuelist:InversionRelic.NAME: Inversion Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yInvert, #yEvoke the original Orb twice.

theDuelist:InversionEvokeRelic.NAME: Inversion Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yInvert, repeat the same #yInvert action.

theDuelist:NaturiaRelic.NAME: Nature Orb
theDuelist:NaturiaRelic.FLAVOR: An orb covered with leaves and dirt. How odd.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yVines gained by playing #yNaturia cards is increased by #b1.

theDuelist:InsectRelic.NAME: Bug Token
theDuelist:InsectRelic.FLAVOR: A dirty token shaped like a beetle.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yPoison from #yTributing an #yInsect, add #b
extra poison. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, have a #b25% chance to further increase this #yPoison buff by #b1.

theDuelist:ElectricToken.NAME: Electric Orb
theDuelist:ElectricToken.FLAVOR: This seems like a very powerful device. What is it doing here in the Spire?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b2 #yElectricity.

theDuelist:MachineToken.NAME: Machine Token
theDuelist:MachineToken.FLAVOR: A mechanical token covered with small wires and strange markings. Best not fiddle with it too much.
DESCRIPTIONS: Explosive Tokens always deal damage randomly to enemies instead of damaging you.

theDuelist:MachineOrb.NAME: Machine Orb
theDuelist:MachineOrb.FLAVOR: A mechanical orb that seems to be ticking?
DESCRIPTIONS: All Explosive Tokens deal extra damage.

theDuelist:Wirebundle.NAME: Wirebundle
theDuelist:Wirebundle.FLAVOR: A bundle of wires. What is it for?
DESCRIPTIONS: Explosive Tokens #yDetonate #b2 extra times.

theDuelist:Fluxrod.NAME: Fluxrod
theDuelist:Fluxrod.FLAVOR: Seems useful for any soldering work I may need to do here in the Spire...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #ySolder, you may choose an additional card to modify.

theDuelist:TokenArmor.NAME: Token Armor
theDuelist:TokenArmor.FLAVOR: A set of cheap looking armor.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger a #yRoulette effect, gain #b7 #yBlock.

theDuelist:BrazeToken.NAME: Braze Token
theDuelist:BrazeToken.FLAVOR: A special token only gifted to those with exceptional soldering abilities.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attempt to #ySolder, draw #b2 cards before triggering the effect.

theDuelist:RouletteWheel.NAME: Roulette Wheel
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger a #yRoulette effect, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by #b1 for the turn.

theDuelist:EngineeringToken.NAME: Engineering Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yDetonate, #ySolder #b2.

theDuelist:Bombchain.NAME: Bombchain
theDuelist:Bombchain.FLAVOR: Oh good, you found a string of bombs!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yDetonate, add a random amount of #rExplosive #rTokens to your hand.

theDuelist:LoadedDice.NAME: Loaded Dice
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yRoulette effect fails to trigger, roll again with a #b25% chance.

theDuelist:TokenfestPendant.NAME: Tokenfest Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yRoulette effect fails to trigger, add a random Token to your hand.

theDuelist:DragonRelic.NAME: Dragon Statue
theDuelist:DragonRelic.FLAVOR: A small statue shaped like a dragon.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yDragonscales from #yTributing a #yDragon, gain #b2 extra #yDragonscales.

theDuelist:SummonAnchor.NAME: Summoning Anchor
theDuelist:SummonAnchor.FLAVOR: A small red and yellow anchor. What a strange color scheme.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySummon #b1 Relic Token at the start of each combat.

theDuelist:SpellcasterToken.NAME: Spellcaster Token
theDuelist:SpellcasterToken.FLAVOR: A glowing purple token that seems to hold a mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an orb #yChannel an additional random orb.

theDuelist:SpellcasterOrb.NAME: Spellcaster Orb
theDuelist:SpellcasterOrb.FLAVOR: A glowing purple orb that seems to hold a mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an orb deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:AquaRelic.NAME: Aqua Orb
theDuelist:AquaRelic.FLAVOR: A small blue sphere that smells a bit salty.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #ySummons from #yTributing an #yAqua, gain #b1 extra #ySummon. NL Synergy: #yAqua #yToken
If the player has #yAqua #yToken, #yTributes are also decreased by #b2.

theDuelist:AquaRelicB.NAME: Aqua Token
theDuelist:AquaRelicB.FLAVOR: A small blue token shaped like seashell. It is quite damp.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yTribute an #yAqua for another, decrease the #yTributes of all monsters in your hand by #y1 for this turn.

theDuelist:NatureRelic.NAME: Nature Token
theDuelist:NatureRelic.FLAVOR: An orb covered with mud and grass. Gross.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you apply at least #b35 #yPoison in combat, drop an extra card reward.
If you apply at least #b35 #yPoison in combat, drop an extra Booster reward.

theDuelist:RandomTributeMonsterRelic.NAME: Tribute Statue
theDuelist:RandomTributeMonsterRelic.FLAVOR: A glowing red stone. It holds mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b1 of #b5 random #yTribute monsters to add to your deck. The chosen monster's #yTribute cost is set to #b1.

theDuelist:TributeEggRelic.NAME: Tribute Egg
theDuelist:TributeEggRelic.FLAVOR: A glowing red egg shaped object. It holds mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #yTribute monster that costs #b2 or more #yTributes to your deck, reduce its #yTribute cost by #b1.

theDuelist:FiendRelic.NAME: Dark Token
theDuelist:FiendRelic.FLAVOR: A small darkened token. It feels evil.
DESCRIPTIONS: Move an additional card to your hand each time you #yTribute a #yFiend for another #yFiend.

theDuelist:ZombieRelic.NAME: Shadow Token
theDuelist:ZombieRelic.FLAVOR: A smoldering, soot covered token. It's very hot!
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yShadow orbs spawn with #b2 extra damage per #yResummon.

theDuelist:DragonRelicB.NAME: Dragon Pendant
theDuelist:DragonRelicB.FLAVOR: A small necklace with a pendant shaped like a dragon.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every other time you #yTribute a #yDragon for another #yDragon, draw #b1 #yRare card.

theDuelist:UpgradeBuffRelic.NAME: Ultra Stone
theDuelist:UpgradeBuffRelic.FLAVOR: A glowing red orb that seems to pulsate and emit a great power.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrading Duelist cards will grant extra bonuses.

theDuelist:ShopToken.NAME: Shop Token
theDuelist:ShopToken.FLAVOR: A weird looking rug shaped token.
DESCRIPTIONS: You will encounter rarer relics in the shop more often.

theDuelist:PyramidLight.NAME: Pyramid of Light
DESCRIPTIONS: You can upgrade #yCurses and they become Colorless cards.

theDuelist:YugiMirror.NAME: Yugi's Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, duplicate a random #yTribute card in your deck. The duplicated copy costs #b0.

theDuelist:StoneKulElna.NAME: Stone of Kul Elna
DESCRIPTIONS: Spells cost #b0. Start each combat [#FF5252]Hexxed.

theDuelist:BlessingAknadin.NAME: Blessing of Aknadin
DESCRIPTIONS: All combats have a small chance to drop an additional Common or Uncommon relic.

theDuelist:HasanPendant.NAME: Hasan's Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Discarded cards are instead sent to your draw pile.

theDuelist:MarikToken.NAME: Marik's Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Trap that costs [E] [E] or less, multiply your #yStrength by the cost of the Trap multiplied by #b-1.

theDuelist:ZombieRelicB.NAME: Zombie Token
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, if your health is full, copy a random card from your #yExhaust pile into your hand.

theDuelist:DragonRelicC.NAME: Dragon Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yTribute a #yDragon for another, have a #b20% chance to gain [E]

theDuelist:ZombieResummonBuffRelic.NAME: Zombie Statue
theDuelist:ZombieResummonBuffRelic.FLAVOR: A small statue shaped like a zombie.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yBlock from #yResummoning a #yZombie, gain #b5 extra #yBlock.

theDuelist:HauntedRelic.NAME: Haunted Pendant
theDuelist:HauntedRelic.FLAVOR: A small grey necklace shaped like a ghost. Creepy!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Start each combat #yHaunted.
Chooses a random type of card. For the rest of combat, all cards of this type cost #b0. Whenever you play a card of this type, trigger a random negative effect.

theDuelist:ToonRelic.NAME: Cartoon Statue
DESCRIPTIONS: When you apply #yVulnerable from #yTributing a #yToon, apply #b1 extra #yVulnerable.

theDuelist:SpellcasterStone.NAME: Spellcaster Stone
theDuelist:SpellcasterStone.FLAVOR: A glowing purple stone that seems to hold a marvelous power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b5 #yMagicka and #b2 #yWeak.
Buff that gives extra block whenever you trigger the #ySpellcaster block-on-attack effect.

theDuelist:BoosterAlwaysBonusRelic.NAME: Bonus Orb
theDuelist:BoosterAlwaysBonusRelic.FLAVOR: All bonus packs. All the time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Always receive a Bonus Booster pack with any Booster rewards.

theDuelist:BoosterAlwaysSillyRelic.NAME: Booster Bonanza
DESCRIPTIONS: Booster pack rewards are always Bonanza Packs, which contain #b5 random cards.

theDuelist:BoosterBetterBoostersRelic.NAME: Upgrade Stone
theDuelist:BoosterBetterBoostersRelic.FLAVOR: Get yourself some high quality card packs!
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the chances of receiving better Booster packs. No longer receive Common Boosters.

theDuelist:BoosterExtraAllRaresRelic.NAME: Booster Power Token
theDuelist:BoosterExtraAllRaresRelic.FLAVOR: These are some seriously good pulls!
DESCRIPTIONS: Every Booster pack reward has a #b50% chance to roll an #yAll #yRares #yBooster.

theDuelist:BoosterBonusPackIncreaseRelic.NAME: Bonus Pack Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Bonus Booster packs contain #b5 cards instead of #b3.

theDuelist:BoosterPackEggRelic.NAME: Booster Egg
DESCRIPTIONS: All cards received from Booster packs are #yUpgraded.

theDuelist:SpellMaxHPRelic.NAME: Spell Bowl
theDuelist:SpellMaxHPRelic.FLAVOR: A Spell a day keeps the Spellcasters away.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #ySpell to your deck, gain #b1 Max HP.

theDuelist:WhiteBowlRelic.NAME: White Bowl
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel a #yWhite.

theDuelist:SummonAnchorRare.NAME: Magician's Anchor
theDuelist:SummonAnchorRare.FLAVOR: This strange anchor appears to be imbided with powerful magic...
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySummon #b2 random Tokens at the start of each combat.

theDuelist:GamblerChip.NAME: Gambler's Chip
theDuelist:GamblerChip.FLAVOR: You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Yugi's Lucky Chip!"
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Whenever you attempt to obtain a card, have a #b50% chance to not receive the card.

theDuelist:MerchantPendant.NAME: Merchant's Pendant
theDuelist:MerchantPendant.FLAVOR: A rug pendant? The Merchant is such a weird fellow.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, refresh the entire shop. Apply #yUpgrades to a random type of card. Apply a random discount to everything in the shop.

theDuelist:MerchantNecklace.NAME: Merchant's Necklace
theDuelist:MerchantNecklace.FLAVOR: A rug necklace? The Merchant is such a weird dude.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]in [#2aecd7]a [#2aecd7]shop [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate. NL Refresh all cards, relics, and potions in the shop. Apply #yUpgrades to a random type of card. Starts with #b2 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, this relic has a #b50% chance to gain #b1 #yCharge.

theDuelist:MerchantTalisman.NAME: Merchant's Talisman
theDuelist:MerchantTalisman.FLAVOR: It's all rugs. All his stuff is rugs. Even this weird talisman thing is rug-shaped.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, duplicate all #ySpells in your deck.

theDuelist:MerchantSword.NAME: Merchant's Sword
theDuelist:MerchantSword.FLAVOR: How can a sword even be rug-shaped?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, duplicate all #yMonsters in your deck.

theDuelist:MerchantRugbox.NAME: Merchant's Rugbox
theDuelist:MerchantRugbox.FLAVOR: A whole box of the merchant's used up rugs. These really could use a wash...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, duplicate all #yTraps in your deck.

theDuelist:Monsterbox.NAME: Monsterbox
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 5 random monster types. Replace ALL monsters from your deck with an equal number of random monsters from the chosen type.

theDuelist:Spellbox.NAME: Spellbox
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove ALL Spells from your deck and replace them with an equal number of random Spells.

theDuelist:Trapbox.NAME: Trapbox
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove ALL Traps from your deck and replace them with an equal number of random Traps.

theDuelist:Spellheart.NAME: Spellheart
theDuelist:Spellheart.FLAVOR: A tasty magical fruit, usually consumed by magicians.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove ALL Spells from your deck. Gain #b4 Max HP for each Spell removed.

theDuelist:TrapVortex.NAME: Trap Vortex
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove ALL Traps from your deck. At the start of each combat, gain
equal to the number of Traps removed.

theDuelist:MonsterEggRelic.NAME: Egg Token
theDuelist:MonsterEggRelic.FLAVOR: A small egg-shaped token. Seems valuable.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b3 #yMonster #yEggs (with modified stats) to your draw pile.

theDuelist:MagnetRelic.NAME: Magnet Stimulus
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain all basic Magnet Warriors and Valkyrion. Lose #b10 Max HP.

theDuelist:KaibaToken.NAME: Kaiba Token
theDuelist:KaibaToken.FLAVOR: A token shaped like a small treasure chest.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you obtain a monster, gain Gold based on the rarity of the monster. NL #yCommon: #b10 Gold NL #yUncommon: #b20 Gold NL #yRare: #b30 Gold NL #yOther: #b40 Gold

theDuelist:AknamkanonsEssence.NAME: Aknamkanon's Essence

Each time you attack with a max stack of #ySummons, gain #b10 Gold.

theDuelist:MarkExxod.NAME: Mark of Exxod
theDuelist:MarkExxod.FLAVOR: This brand was used by Ancient Egyptians to signify warriors who had successfully summoned Exodia in battle.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer obtain duplicate cards. Gain #b10 Max HP.

theDuelist:DuelistCoin.NAME: Yu-Gi-Oh! Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b30 #yGold for each other relic you have.

theDuelist:MetronomeRelicA.NAME: Metronomic
theDuelist:MetronomeRelicA.FLAVOR: A pristine, high quality, wooden metronome. Gotta practice those paradiddles!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Metronome, #yResummon another random Metronome on a random enemy.

theDuelist:MetronomeRelicB.NAME: Metronometry
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b3 random Metronomes to your draw pile.

theDuelist:MetronomeRelicC.NAME: Solidified Metronome
theDuelist:MetronomeRelicC.FLAVOR: A sturdy metronome made from a piece of rock.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Metronome, gain #b2 Block.

theDuelist:MetronomeRelicD.NAME: Metronomic Power
theDuelist:MetronomeRelicD.FLAVOR: You feel a strong pulsing sensation when holding this relic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yStrength, add a #yRandomized Metronome to your hand.

theDuelist:NamelessPowerRelicA.FLAVOR: I'm running out of flavor text ideas.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every other turn, gain #b4 #yVigor.

theDuelist:NamelessGreedRelic.NAME: Ascended Greed

theDuelist:NamelessHungerRelic.NAME: Ascended Hunger
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you obtain a potion, gain #b2 Max HP.

theDuelist:NamelessWarRelicA.NAME: Apprentice War
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies start combat with #b10% less HP.

theDuelist:NamelessWarRelicB.NAME: Duelist War
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of Boss and Elite combats, gain #b3 #yStrength.

theDuelist:NamelessWarRelicC.NAME: Ascended War
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yTribute monster, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theDuelist:Leafblower.NAME: Leafblower
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase #yBlock gained by #yLeaves by #b20%.

theDuelist:NatureOrb.NAME: Vine Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase damage of #yVines by #b20%.

theDuelist:MarkOfNature.NAME: Mark of Nature
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yTribute a #yNaturia for another, gain #b1 extra #yVine.

theDuelist:Leafpile.NAME: Leafpile
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yNaturia, gain #b1 Leaf.

theDuelist:CursedHealer.NAME: Nameless
theDuelist:CursedHealer.FLAVOR: You succumbed to the Tomb of the Nameless...
DESCRIPTIONS: You chose to rest in a place where an ancient evil lives.

theDuelist:DragonBurnRelic.NAME: Burning Statue
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDragons always apply #yBurning to their targets.

theDuelist:GoldenScale.NAME: Golden Scales
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yDragonscales, gain #b2 extra.

theDuelist:TokenUpgradeRelic.NAME: Shiny Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Tokens can be Upgraded an infinite amount of times.

theDuelist:OrbCardRelic.NAME: Orbstone
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 4 random orb cards to add to your deck. Orb cards are 0-cost Spells that #yChannel orbs.

theDuelist:FatMaxHPRelic.NAME: HP Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b200 #yMax #yHP and delete half of your deck (randomly).

theDuelist:DuelistPrismaticShard.NAME: Duelist's Shard
theDuelist:DuelistPrismaticShard.FLAVOR: Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new perspectives.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, add a random card set to the card pool.

theDuelist:MillenniumPeriapt.NAME: Millennium Periapt
theDuelist:MillenniumPeriapt.FLAVOR: This stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your starting #yMax #ySummons by #b2.

theDuelist:DuelistTeaSet.NAME: Duelist's Tea Set
theDuelist:DuelistTeaSet.FLAVOR: The key to a refreshing night's rest.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with #b5 extra #yMax #ySummons.

theDuelist:DuelistOrichalcum.NAME: Arcanestone
theDuelist:DuelistOrichalcum.FLAVOR: A lavender tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly destructible.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn without #ySummons, #ySummon #b3 Relic Tokens.

theDuelist:DuelistLetterOpener.NAME: Paladin Scrollcleaver
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 #ySpells in a single turn, deal #b8 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:DuelistUrn.NAME: Magical Urn
theDuelist:DuelistUrn.FLAVOR: This urn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous. And he's colorful!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yTrap, heal #b2 HP.

theDuelist:BlessingAnubis.NAME: Blessing of Anubis
theDuelist:BlessingAnubis.FLAVOR: Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new perspectives.
DESCRIPTIONS: NL Consume #b1 #yCharge, choose any card type and draw #b1 card of that type. Starts with #b3 #yCharges, gain #b1 #yCharge every #b4 turns. Can only hold #b3 #yCharges at once.

theDuelist:AkhenamkhanenSceptre.NAME: Akhenamkhanen's Sceptre
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove as many cards from your deck as you want. Lose #b6 #yMax #yHP for each card removed.

theDuelist:MillenniumPrayerbook.NAME: Millennium Prayerbook
theDuelist:MillenniumPrayerbook.FLAVOR: A powerful book of divine magical spells and prayers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose a card type. At the start of each turn, add #yRandomized card(s) of the chosen type to your hand. NL [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]increase [#2aecd7]the [#2aecd7]number [#2aecd7]of [#2aecd7]cards [#2aecd7]added [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]your [#2aecd7]hand [#2aecd7]by [#2aecd7]1 [#2aecd7]for [#2aecd7]150 [#2aecd7]Gold.

theDuelist:PrayerPageA.FLAVOR: A torn page with some illegible ancient writing on it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add extra monster types to your #bMillennium #bPrayerbook options.

theDuelist:PrayerPageB.NAME: Ascended Prayer Page
theDuelist:PrayerPageB.FLAVOR: A torn page with some illegible ancient writing on it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add an extra card type to your #bMillennium #bPrayerbook options.

theDuelist:PrayerPageC.NAME: Ancient Prayer Page
theDuelist:PrayerPageC.FLAVOR: A torn page with some illegible ancient writing on it.

theDuelist:PrayerPageD.NAME: Pharaoh Prayer Page
theDuelist:PrayerPageD.FLAVOR: A torn page with some illegible ancient writing on it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add several extra selections to your #bMillennium #bPrayerbook options.

theDuelist:PrayerPageE.NAME: Merchant Prayer Page
theDuelist:PrayerPageE.FLAVOR: A torn page with some illegible ancient writing on it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add bonus card types to your #bMillennium #bPrayerbook options.

theDuelist:MillenniumArmor.NAME: Millennium Armor
theDuelist:MillenniumArmor.FLAVOR: A powerful set of ancient armor. Once worn by a Pharaoh.

#yTemporary #yHP.

theDuelist:ArmorPlateA.FLAVOR: Reinforced pieces of magical steel. Improves the Millennium Armor.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the amount of #yTemporary #yHP generated by your #bMillennium #bArmor by #b4.

theDuelist:ArmorPlateB.NAME: Millennium Plating
theDuelist:ArmorPlateB.FLAVOR: Reinforced pieces of magical steel. Improves the Millennium Armor.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the amount of #yTemporary #yHP generated by your #bMillennium #bArmor by #b6.

theDuelist:ArmorPlateC.NAME: Millennium Plating
theDuelist:ArmorPlateC.FLAVOR: Reinforced pieces of magical steel. Improves the Millennium Armor.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the amount of #yTemporary #yHP generated by your #bMillennium #bArmor by #b10.

theDuelist:ArmorPlateD.NAME: Millennium Plating
theDuelist:ArmorPlateD.FLAVOR: Reinforced pieces of magical steel. Improves the Millennium Armor.

theDuelist:ZoneToken.NAME: Zone Token
theDuelist:ZoneToken.FLAVOR: Gotta beef up those summoning zones!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yTribute monster that costs #b5 or more #yTributes, #yIncrement #b2.

theDuelist:SolderToken.NAME: Solder Token
theDuelist:SolderToken.FLAVOR: The sweet smell of burning solder in the morning...

NL
#bMillennium #bPuzzle: NL Typed Tokens become Puzzle Tokens.
#bMillennium #bPuzzle: NL Deck effects are weakened or reduced.
Start each combat with #b4 #yMax #ySummons.
All Elites start combat with a random #yBuff.
Start each run with #b0 #yGold.
At the start of each of your turns, all enemies have a chance to gain #yBlock.

Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, lose all of your Potions.
#bMillennium #bPuzzle: NL Puzzle Tokens become #rExplosive Tokens.

At most Rest Sites, you may only #yRest or #ySmith.
At the start of Elite combats, add a random #rCurse into your discard pile.
All Bosses and Elites start combat with a random #yBuff.
#ySummoning is restricted.
Standard: #b50% chance to randomize the cost of Spells when drawn.
Dragon: #yDragon tribute synergy effect has a #b50% chance to fail.
Naturia: resistance to #yVines is increased.

Toon: #yToon #yWorld always has a damage cap #b2 points higher than normal.
Zombie: Start each combat with restricted #yResummoning.
Aqua: #yAqua tribute synergy effect only triggers #b50% of the time.
Fiend: When triggered, the #yFiend tribute synergy effect increases the cost of all cards in discard by #b1 for the turn.
Machine: #rExplosive #rTokens always have a #b10% chance to damage you, and do not summon Bomb Casings when #yDetonated.
